simulator.title: Loan Simulator (คำนวณสินเชื่อใหม่)
simulator.description: Planning to buy a house or car? Use the simulator to see how a new loan will affect your financial health before you apply.
simulator.step1Desc: Select the loan type (Home, Car, or Personal) you want to simulate.
simulator.step2Desc: Enter the loan amount, interest rate, and term (years).
simulator.step3Desc: The app calculates the estimated monthly payment.
simulator.step4Desc: Click "Add to Scenario" to see how your DSR changes with this new burden.
